title: Full Metal Panic! Comic Mission
alternative_title: フルメタル・パニック!COMIC MISSION ; Fullmetal Panic! Comic Mission
status: フルメタル・パニック!COMIC MISSION ; Fullmetal Panic! Comic Mission
description:
Description :
        Basically, it's a retanking of some chapters from Full Metal Panic!. It's sort of like FMP! Fumoffu.. meaning that there's no mecha plotline, only short stories. Also there's an extra story not presented anywhere in each volume of this series.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.4 Chapter 28.5 : Extra Mission - Very Difficult To Follow The Steps To Romance!!?
Vol.2 Chapter 15.5 : Taiyaki-Kun Of The Battlefield
